name: Bob & Flop
description:
One's Bob, other's Flop. You'll know who's who.

Bob & Flop is a fun little puzzle-platformer where you get to take your peculiar pet for a (not-so) casual walk! 

Hit Bots with boxes (if you'd like). Don't worry, Flop won't get hurt, he's been through a lot. Oh, and he just LOVES pancakes!

Bob is a little slower, but he's the only one who can hold the leash when Flop is on a walk. And Flop only listens to him anyway, so...

Enjoy this small adventure (and don't forget to rate it and comment)!

Controls

Choose where to throw Flop with your Mouse
Throw Flop with Left Mouse Button. Bob will follow.
Control the length of the leash with Q and E

To see more controls - press F during the game.
